original_text: And he went thither to Naioth in Ramah: and the Spirit of God was upon him also, and he went on, and prophesied, until he came to Naioth in Ramah.
korean_text: 사울이 라마 나욧으로 가니라 하나님의 영이 그에게도 임하시니 그가 라마 나욧에 이르기까지 걸어가며 예언을 하였으며

sentences.original_text: And he went thither to Naioth in Ramah
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 라맛에 있는 나이옷으로 그곳에 갔고

sentences.original_text: and the Spirit of God was upon him also
and he went on, and prophesied
until he came to Naioth in Ramah
